ygData.subject: Re: Blacked armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Stats on blackend, heavier and less AC than banded, and yes, makes you look blackend.  Paw, but you ll need a nice party of low 20 guys to get it. Salr
ygData.messageBody:
Stats on blackend, heavier and less AC than banded, and yes, makes you look blackend. Paw, but you'll need a nice party of low 20 guys to get it.

Salr D'Taynkk
Dark Warrior of The Kith
Veeshan

>>> "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...> 5.14.99 12:07:50 PM >>>
From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>

Hail again!

Whats the scoop on blackened armor? What are the stats and where do you go
about getting it? I have full banded....but if blackened is better then id
like to upgrade...oh and does it make your char look all black? Cause if it
does then its a definate must get for me! Lemme know.

Lothaniel T'kazz
